title: Cookware handle

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a cookware handle, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a perspective top view of the cookware handle of the present invention.
FIG. 2 is a left side view of the cookware handle of FIG. 1, the right side view being a mirror-image of FIG. 2.
FIG. 3 is a bottom plan view of the cookware handle of the present invention; and,
FIG. 4 is a top plan view of the cookware handle of the present invention.
The broken lines showing the pan on FIGS. 1–4 are for illustrative purposes only and form no part of the claimed design.
